title: Champion Sale
body: I have been waiting a long time to see illaoi on sale but that has yet to come, some champions have been on sale for three times why cant the tentacles goddes be on sale?How does this champion sale thing even work.I hope illaoi gets on sale soon.Thnx.

replies.body: At the moment I'm not sure when Illaoi will be going on sale, but make sure to check out the [**sales page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) from time to time to know when she will be!
I checked the sales page ,she hasnt been on sale since she was released unless I missed it.Well thnx i will b waiting.

She'll be on sale when calamari is in season! You'll need to wait patiently until then, it takes a while for Riot to go through all the champions when cycling only 4 of them at a time... I'd say it's easier just to buy her with IP if you don't like waiting just like me ^_^. Why wait when you can slam dunk people with your towering tentacles and slowly crush their souls, break their spirits to ever come back again by solo pentakilling the enemy team at Baron Pit? GLHF, please don't bm them afterwards when you steal Baron!
You see my frend said he was gonna gift me when she gets on sale but she hasnt been on sale ever since she was released,Thnk u for ur time.
